com.qtplaf.library.database.rdbms

Class DBEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.rdbms.DBEngine

  • public class DBEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    A database engine represent a backend JDBC database.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Executes a select recordset. The connection stays opened.
        Parameters:
        select - The select statement.
        maxRecords - The maximum number of records to retrieve.
        cn - The connection.
        Returns:
        The recordset.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.
